data.name: Slave Princess Finne, why did she sell out her own kingdom?
data.detailed_description:
New Releases

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1990590
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1731200


About the Game

Slave Princess Finne is a classic JRPG developed by Circle Fairy Flower and published by OTAKU Plan.

STORY

This is a war waged between the "princesses" representing the whole race to bet on world hegemony.
Once upon a time, it was the human princess who won the battle. From then on, the elves were reduced to "slaves".

A thousand years later.
The war of the princesses begins again.

The princess who participated in the war on behalf of human was named Finne.
But in her body, there flows half of the elve's blood.

The princess, who hesitated between saving the country and betraying the country, now faced the final choice in her intertwined fate.

FEATURES

  • JRPG
  • Turn based command battle
  • Auto battle mode for those who are busy
  • Lively characters

From then on, the elves were reduced to "slaves". A thousand years later. The war of the princesses begins again.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
